Directions: Refer to the passage(s) and image(s) shown, then answer each question that follows.
Title: Getting Around Town â€“ Part 1
Content: Five students were talking about how long it takes to get to school. They all lived on the same street close enough to school that they could not ride the bus. They met at the end of their street each morning and at the same place outside of school in the afternoon. The students used their own timers to record how long it took each of them to get to school and back home during one day.
